description: Kiley`s Vaporeon is the evolved form of Kiley`s Eevee. As a professional surfer, Kiley would always take his Eevee with him to both training sessions and competitions. Kiley`s Eevee loved the sea, so it occurred to Kiley one day that he should try surfing with Eevee on the board and he gave it a Water Stone to evolve it.
name: Eievui (Kairi)
